sc.fiji.snt.analysis

Class PersistenceAnalyzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • sc.fiji.snt.analysis.PersistenceAnalyzer

  • public class PersistenceAnalyzer
extends java.lang.Object
    Performs persistent homology analysis on a Tree. For an overview see Kanari, L. et al. A Topological Representation of Branching Neuronal Morphologies. Neuroinform 16, 3â€“13 (2018).
    Author:
    Cameron Arshadi, Tiago Ferreira

    • Method Detail

      • getDiagram

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double>> getDiagram(java.lang.String descriptor)
                                                                      throws sc.fiji.snt.analysis.UnknownMetricException,
                                                                             java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Gets the persistence diagram.
        Parameters:
        descriptor - A descriptor for the filter function as per getDescriptors() (case insensitive), such as radial, geodesic, centrifugal (reverse Strahler), etc.
        Returns:
        the persistence diagram
        Throws:
        UnknownMetricException - If descriptor is not valid
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the tree's graph could not be obtained

      • getBarcode

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> getBarcode(java.lang.String descriptor)
                                                 throws sc.fiji.snt.analysis.UnknownMetricException,
                                                        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Gets the 'barcode' for the specified filter function.
        Parameters:
        descriptor - A descriptor for the filter function as per getDescriptors() (case insensitive), such as radial, geodesic, centrifugal (reverse Strahler), etc.
        Returns:
        the barcode
        Throws:
        UnknownMetricException - If descriptor is not valid
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the tree's graph could not be obtained

      • getDiagramNodes

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<SWCPoint>> getDiagramNodes(java.lang.String descriptor)
        Gets the persistence diagram nodes.
        Parameters:
        descriptor - A descriptor for the filter function as per getDescriptors() (case insensitive), such as radial, geodesic, centrifugal (reverse Strahler), etc.
        Returns:
        the persistence diagram nodes.
        Throws:
        UnknownMetricException - If descriptor is not valid.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the tree's graph could not be obtained

      • getLandscape

        public double[] getLandscape(java.lang.String descriptor,
                             int numLandscapes,
                             int resolution)
        Gets the persistence landscape.
        Parameters:
        descriptor - A descriptor for the filter function as per getDescriptors() (case insensitive), such as radial, geodesic, centrifugal (reverse Strahler), etc.
        numLandscapes - the number of piecewise-linear functions to output.
        resolution - the number of samples for all piecewise-linear functions.

      • getDescriptors

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getDescriptors()
        Gets a list of supported descriptor functions.
        Returns:
        the list of available descriptors.
